careerSummary: I am an extremely passionate developer, starting to understand core application logic over 20 years ago, with basic automation, shared libraries and dialogs. Within the last 15 years, I have throttled this field into the world of web and mobile, touching base on several platforms, design patterns and varied database systems. I am a self-confessed perfectionist, rigid to clean, structured code. Open, dedicated and honest and hold myself to the highest level of accountability. Referees can be provided on request.
